Marjorie n/a

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Pat Gallagher
  3. Location of Family: Spalding, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 5
  7. Date of Birth: 11/16/1906, Ireland
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Marjorie Barry
  10. Spouse Name: Joe Barry
  11. Notes: Titanic survivor; her father went down with the ship; she and her mother were rescued; her mother placed her in the Foundling Hospital.
  12. Source: OTR, 346; The Catholic News, 14 April 1962 (found in Sommer, Albert file according to info sheet); National Orphan Train Complex; Omaha World Herald; Grand Island Independent, 17 May 1912.
